text: Ante Hrkać (born 11 March 1992) is a Bosnian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Serie C club Novara. ==Club career== On 18 August 2020, he signed a 2-year contract with Italian club Novara. ==Honours== Široki Brijeg *Bosnian Cup runner-up: 2018–19 ==References== ==External links== *Ante Hrkać at Sofascore Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Široki Brijeg Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Expatriate footballers in Croatia Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Expatriate footballers in Italy Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina players Category:First League of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina players Category:Croatian Second Football League players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Serie C players Category:NK GOŠK Gabela players Category:NK Vitez players Category:HNK Segesta players Category:NK Lokomotiva players Category:NK Lučko players Category:NK Čelik Zenica players Category:KF Teuta Durrës players Category:NK Široki Brijeg players Category:Novara Calcio players Category:Association football defenders
title: Ante Hrkać
